Translations.Text: Yoho lyudy vidpovily kazhuchy, "Evict yim z vashoho mista. Vony lyudy kotri bazhayutʹ buty chysti
Otzhe, my vryatuvaly yoho ta yoho rodynu, ale ne yoho druzhynu; vona bula z pryrechenyy
My showered yim z pevnoyu zlyvoyu; prymitka naslidky dlya vynuvati

Midyan my poslaly yikhnʹomu bratu Shu`aib. Vin skazav, "O moyi lyudy, obozhnyuyutʹ BOHA; vy ne mayete inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Dokaz prybuv do vas z vashoho Lorda. Vy budete daty povnu vahu ta povnu miru koly vy torhivlya. Ne obduritʹ lyudey z yikhnikh prav. Ne pidkupitʹ zemlyu pislya tse ye vstanovlenyy pryamo. Tse ye krashche dlya vas, yakshcho vy viruyuchi

Utrymuyutʹsya vid blokuyuchoho kozhnoho shlyakhu, shukayuchy shchob vidkhylyty tsi khto vvazhayutʹ z shlyakhu BOHA, ta ne vstyhayutʹ kryvyy. Zapam'yatayte shcho vy zvychayno buly malo ta Vin pomnozhyv vashe chyslo. Z·hadayte naslidky dlya bezputni
Zaraz shcho deyakyy z vy viryly v shcho ya buv poslanyy z, ta deyakyy disbelieved, chekayu do BOHA vydaye Yoho vyrok mizh namy; Vin yavlyaye soboyu krashchoho suddyu
